alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued November 28 at 7:01AM EST until November 29 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches, especially in the higher elevations away from Lake Erie. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Lake, Geauga, Ashtabula Inland and Ashtabula Lakeshore counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact this morning`s commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will become focused in the higher terrain away from Lake Erie today before shifting closer to the lakeshore this evening.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Geauga; Lake
